messages.subject: Me again
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you so much to everyone who responded to my newbie post.  I can tell already that I am going to enjoy it here and that I will learn lots too. I forgot
messages.messageBody:
Thank you so much to everyone who responded to my 'newbie' post. I can
tell already that I am going to enjoy it here and that I will learn
lots too.

I forgot to post where I am from. I live in New Brunswick, Canada. I
grew up in Fredericton but now live outside the city in Harvey.

Hi Cher!!! :o) Isn't that neat how I joined a group and I actually know
somebody here. Thanks for emailing me I really appreciate your help.

Look out ladies I will probablly drive you crazy with a zillion
questions! Yes, a zillion seems about right. :P

Lisa E in NB :o)
